## IDecoratorResolution interface

Represents fluent cascading interface for services resolution

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDecoratorResolution 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [args(value)](./typeioc.idecoratorresolution.args.md) | Sets arguments for service instantiation |
|  [attempt()](./typeioc.idecoratorresolution.attempt.md) | Sets attempted resolution flag indicating non disruptive resolution behavior (no exception is thrown when no registration found) |
|  [cache(name)](./typeioc.idecoratorresolution.cache.md) | Sets cached resolution flag. When resolved, resolution will be stored in cache |
|  [name(value)](./typeioc.idecoratorresolution.name.md) | Sets named resolution flag. Service will be resolved given the name provided |
|  [resolve()](./typeioc.idecoratorresolution.resolve.md) | Finalizes service resolution specification |
